ygData.subject: Re: Lets find Bidl Frugin
ygData.msgSnippet: Well if that quewst is designed for level 12 players they definately weren t talking about any mino locations except for the ones in Steamfont. But if you
ygData.messageBody:
Well if that quewst is designed for level 12 players they definately
weren''t talking about any mino locations except for the ones in Steamfont.
But if you want to check other places here you go.
Locations I have seen minos:
Steamfont (in the mino mines)
Gorge of king Xorbb (Beholder Maze)
Najena (back with the goblen magicians and that huge spider)
Herd there were some in Lower Guk, but I don't think I am quite ready to go
exploring there.

Good Luck finding him. He probably spawned inside a wall and got stuck. :(

Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCK
Master of Recruiting
www.bck.org
"The Crimson Knights"
Fennin Ro
